headline: Is Franklin Resources (BEN) Pricing Justified After Strong One Year Share Price Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Franklin Resources is priced attractively today, it helps to start by looking at how the market has been treating the stock recently and how that lines up with its fundamentals. The share price last closed at US$26.62, with returns of 5.2% over the past week, 11.4% over the past month, 11.8% year to date and 26.8% over the past year, alongside a 6.2% decline over three years and a 31.0% gain over five years. Recent coverage of Franklin Resources has focused on...

headline: Why Franklin Resources (BEN) Is Up 5.2% After Earnings Beat And New AI Intelligence Hub Rollout
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. recently reported fiscal first-quarter 2026 results, with revenue of US$2,327.1 million and net income of US$255.5 million, alongside basic earnings per share from continuing operations of US$0.46, all higher than the same period a year earlier. At the same time, the firm advanced its multi-year collaboration with Microsoft by launching Intelligence Hub, an AI-driven distribution platform designed to centralize data, automate workflows, and enhance client engagement...
